Hello, I would like you to read an idea that I had recently right after the allay won the votes, and it is about the breed of this mob, you see, as far as I know, the villager is the only mob with a unique form of breed ( that's because when you give them food with a right click, that only opens their trade menu, that's why they have that unique mechanic with beds and food) and in that I realized that the most coherent way to give an item to the Allay for him to collect it is with right click (because throwing the object at it does not sound like a logical thing, there could be several objects on the floor and I would not know what to collect) but the problem I saw there is that if we tried to breed the Allay with a click Right, he would grab the food thinking that it is something he should collect, this is the point I wanted to get to, the Allay is an opportunity to have more unique forms of breed mobs, I thought (since Allay is a fan of musical blocks) if the player plays a music disc on the jukebox, there may be a chance that when two allays are in close proximity, they get together on the jukebox, and do a little dance (maybe they just do that cute spin at the same time) then they would do a baby, that's my idea. It's something that I thought would add more magic to the lives of these little fairies, as well as seeing the opportunity for more unique breed forms.

I propose that they add a back slot to the game, this could be used to equip a backpack (with a maximum of 20 slots capacity and that only opens when equipped), or a melee tool/weapon (being on the back it would have the function of being able to be exchanged with another tool just like this one in the hotbar, such as exchanging a fortune pickaxe for a silk touch pickaxe). The backpack would be made with leather, thread and slime. In my opinion this would solve the inventory problem better than the ender chest or the shulker box, which in addition to requiring you to place them to obtain the content, are objects that are obtained close to the endgame. I don't speak English and I had to use Google Translate to write my idea, I hope you understand.

Hola buenas tardes, hoy estaba jugando en un servidor de pvp en la 1.19.2, estaba peleando contra uno con la espada d√°ndole cr√≠ticos, el claramente se estaba cubriendo con un escudo y ten√≠a un hacha y me gan√≥ solamente d√°ndome cr√≠ticos. Luego yo en otro pvp estaba el la misma situaci√≥n anterior pero al rev√©s, yo era el del hacha, pero esta vez el que tenia la espada si pudo matarme dando cr√≠ticos y yo cubri√©ndome con el escudo. Esto es una verguenza que siendo tantos desarrolladores y tan millonarios(microsoft) os cueste tanto arreglar bugs, aunque entiendo que no es posible tener un juego sin bugs, pero hombre por lo menos que no haya tantos joder, hay much√≠simos bugs dentro del pvp y es injusto para todos. La √∫ltima cosa, estar√≠a muy bien que esuch√°rais a la comunidiad y mejoreis el juego, trayendo el prime de vuelta, y no la mierda de actualizaciones que hacies, 2 nuevos mobs que no hacen nada y no le importan ha nadie y un nuevo tipo de madera que nos la pela. Perd√≥n por mi vocabluario incorrecto pero es que hombre espabilar.

Esqueleto electrico

Especialidad : Lanza flechas que generan una descarga electrica sobre las entidades ala que la flecha toque o entre en contacto.

Se genera en los biomas donde pueden caer tormentas electricas, esto implica que no se puede generar en: Sabana, glaceares, y deciertos
Este segenera durante las tormentas electricas

Su nivel de vida es de 6 corazones, a pesar de su poco nivel de vida este mod no es de confiar ya que su flecha causa da√±o 3.5 corazones, matando a un jugador con 3 flechas si este no se cura rapido.

Este mod y sus flechas tiene una debilidad: el agua

Si sus flechas tocan un bloque de agua ya sea fuente o corriente la flecha se combierte en flecha normal.

Si el esqueleto toca el agua ya sea fuente o corriente, le generara un gran da√±o y si el no sale de esta en 1.5 segundos morira.

Este mod tiene otro problema y es que debido a que la flecha es electrica el escudo no te puede proteger por completo ya que como el escudo solo detiene la flecha el jugador solo recibe la descarga, el jugador recibe 1.5 corazones de da√±o al usar escudo.

Al morir este suelta un item llamado Hueso electrico con el cual se puede hacer Polvo de hueso electrico.

Polvo de hueso elecreico.Hace que los cultivos crescan por completo con un solo polvo y estos que dan electrificados y cuando se cosechan dan 3 veces mas de lo normal. En el caso de la calabaza y la sandia hace que creesca del todo con un solo polvo y producen 3 veces mas rapido de lo normal

Sand is renewable with a wandering trader.

I think almost everything should be renewable, and the more powerful the item is, the harder it should be to renew that item. Or at least have the items that are created from that item be renewable. Exceptions would only be vanity things like armor trims. Or items that are used very commonly (like sand) should be so abundant that they almost cannot be visibly depleted. Which it can in the case of sand because deserts quickly become stone wastelands on servers especially.

Armadillo Sausage Meat

You can make armadillo sausage meat by crushing armadillo meat in a grindstone.

When raw, it restores 3 hunger points and 1.3 saturation. When cooked, it restores 6 hunger points and 5.9 saturation.
This food can stack to 64, just like other stackable items.

Armadillo Burger Meat


You can make armadillo burger meat by crushing armadillo meat in an anvil, by using a mace to crush the meat.

When raw, it restores 2 hunger points and 2.3 saturation. When cooked, it restores 7 hunger points and 8.5 saturation.
Also, eating raw armadillo meat in Minecraft has a 38% chance to give 8 seconds of Poison and 12 seconds of Hunger.
